Package com.ibm.di.api.local

Provides interfaces for managing the local session of the server API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssemblyLine
    Represents an AssemblyLine instance.
    AssemblyLineHandler
    This interface provides several methods to handle an AssemblyLine.
    AssemblyLineListener
    This listener listens for AssemblyLine events.
    ConfigInstance
    Represents a configuration instance and provides various methods for manipulating the configuration.
    ConfigurationFileListener
    This is a base EventListener for receiving Server API Configuration File events.
    DIEventListener
    This is a base EventListener for Server API events.
    LogListener
    This listener listens for log events.
    SecurityRegistry
    This interface provides information about various restrictions a user may have.
    Sequence
    Represents a running Sequence of AssemblyLines
    ServerInfo
    This interface provides various methods for getting server information.
    Session
    This is the local Session interface which provides various methods which could be used with the started TDI Server.
    SessionFactory
    This interface provides methods for creating a Session.
    SystemLog
    This interface provides various methods for getting system log information.
    SystemQueue
    System Queue interface that defines public methods exposed through Server API local session.
    TDIProperties
    Local server API interface to TDIProperties.
    TombstoneManager
    Represents a TombstoneManager instance.

Package com.ibm.di.api.local Description

Provides interfaces for managing the local session of the server API.
